comments:
Using M6, I started getting the following stack trace in console (and my 
environment became unusable). I believe it was related to me "installing" a 
tools plugin in my development environment, trying it for a while, and then 
deleting that tools plugin. [The tool happened to be the check style tool, com.
atlassw.tools.eclipse.checkstyle_3.3.1.0, if that matters for reproducing.]. I 
was able to get past it by starting once with -noregistrycache specified. 

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 Jan 27, 2004 14:29:52.410
!MESSAGE Unhandled event loop exception
Unhandled event loop exception
